name: Aspect of the Beast, Mythic

sections.body: Your bestial nature manifests itself in one of the following ways. You choose the manifestation when you choose the feat, and you can't change it.

If you have normal vision, you gain darkvision 30 feet. If you have low-light vision, you gain darkvision 60 feet. If you have darkvision, the range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet plus 10 feet per tier.
sections.name: Mythic Senses
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Feats/Aspect of the Beast/Mythic/Benefits/Mythic Senses

sections.body: You grow a pair of powerful claws. These claws are primary attacks that deal 1d4 points of damage (1d3 if you're Small). If you already have claws, the damage they deal increases by one die type (d4s become d6s, d3s become d4s, and so on). You can expend one use of mythic power when you hit with both claws during the same round to rend with those claws, dealing extra damage equal to one claw's damage plus 1-1/2 times your Strength bonus.
sections.name: Mythic Claws
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Feats/Aspect of the Beast/Mythic/Benefits/Mythic Claws

sections.body: You can make a running jump without needing to run 10 feet beforehand. In addition, you gain a +5 bonus on your Acrobatics checks to determine the success of that jump and the distance covered. If you already have the predator's leap manifestation of Aspect of the Beast, the bonus on your Acrobatics checks increases to +10.
sections.name: Mythic Leap
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Feats/Aspect of the Beast/Mythic/Benefits/Mythic Leap

sections.body: You gain a +2 bonus on initiative checks and a +2 bonus on Survival checks. These bonuses stack with those gained from the wild instinct manifestation of Aspect of the Beast.
sections.name: Mythic Instinct
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Feats/Aspect of the Beast/Mythic/Benefits/Mythic Instinct

sections.name: Benefits

description: Your blood burns with savage fury, giving you bestial powers and abilities.
